meanings.definition: Able to be folded or collapsed for easy storage.
meanings.sent1: The foldaway chair can be easily stored in the closet.
meanings.sent2: I bought a foldaway table for my small apartment.
meanings.sent3: The foldaway bed decided to take a nap in the cupboard.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was like a foldaway umbrella, opening up to brighten the room.
meanings.sent5: The foldaway bike unfolded into a sleek and stylish ride.

meanings.definition: A piece of furniture or equipment that can be folded for storage.
meanings.sent1: We brought out the foldaway for extra seating during the party.
meanings.sent2: The camping trip was made easier with a foldaway table.
meanings.sent3: The foldaway seemed to enjoy its time tucked away in the garage.
meanings.sent4: His heart was a foldaway, closing up to protect itself from hurt.
meanings.sent5: The foldaway chair unfolded with a satisfying click.

meanings.definition: To fold or collapse for storage.
meanings.sent1: She will foldaway the map once we reach our destination.
meanings.sent2: He foldawayed the table after the party was over.
meanings.sent3: The magician amazed the audience by foldawaying a large box into a tiny one.
meanings.sent4: The memories of that day will never foldaway from my mind.
meanings.sent5: The artist carefully foldawayed the canvas to transport it to the gallery.
